AR 43. The undertaking shall consider whether and how its process(es) to manage material risks
related to value chain workers are integrated into its existing risk management process(es).
AR 44. When disclosing the resources allocated to the management of material impacts, the
undertaking may disclose which internal functions are involved in managing the impacts and
what types of action they take to address negative and advance positive impacts.
